languages.name: Programming Languages
languages.description: A collection of programming languages i have learned

html.name: HTML
html.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is a markup language used to create the structure and content of web pages.
html.keywords: HTML, Hypertext Markup Language, Web Development

css.name: CSS
css.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
css.keywords: CSS, Cascading Style Sheets, Styling Language, Web Development

scss.name: SCSS
scss.description: SCSS (Sassy CSS) is a preprocessor scripting language that is a superset of CSS, adding features such as variables, mixins, and nesting.
scss.keywords: SCSS, Sassy CSS, Styling Language, Web Development

js.name: JavaScript
js.description: JavaScript is a high-level, object-oriented programming language used to create interactive effects within web browsers.
js.keywords: JavaScript, JS, Programming Language, Web Development

ts.name: TypeScript
ts.description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
ts.keywords: TypeScript, TS, Programming Language, Web Development

php.name: PHP
php.description: PHP (Hypertext Preprocessor) is a server-side scripting language used to create dynamic web pages.
php.keywords: PHP, Hypertext Preprocessor, Programming Language, Web Development

java.name: Java
java.description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
java.keywords: Java, Java SE, Programming Language, Software Development

python.name: Python
python.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language that emphasizes code readability and ease of use.
python.keywords: Python, Python 3, Programming Language, Software Development

mysql.name: MySQL
mysql.description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system.
mysql.keywords: MySQL, Structured Query Language, Database Management System, Software Development

csharp.name: C#
csharp.description: C# is a modern, multi-paradigm programming language created by Microsoft.
csharp.keywords: C#, C Sharp, Programming Language, Software Development

bash.name: Bash
bash.description: Bash is a shell program for Unix-like operating systems that allows users to enter commands to interact with the operating system.
bash.keywords: Bash, Shell, Command Line Interface, CLI, Unix-like

vim.name: Vim
vim.description: Vim is a text editor program for Unix-like operating systems that provides powerful editing capabilities and supports many programming languages.
vim.keywords: Vim, Text Editor, Command Line Interface, CLI, Unix-like

office.name: Microsoft Office
office.description: Microsoft Office is a suite of productivity software applications developed and published by Microsoft.
office.keywords: Microsoft Office, Productivity Suite, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Access

hasPart.name: Microsoft Word
hasPart.description: Microsoft Word is a word processing software application developed and published by Microsoft.
hasPart.keywords: Microsoft Word, Word Processor, Text Editor

hasPart.name: Microsoft Excel
hasPart.description: Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet software application developed and published by Microsoft.
hasPart.keywords: Microsoft Excel, Spreadsheet, Calculation, Data Analysis

hasPart.name: Microsoft PowerPoint
hasPart.description: Microsoft PowerPoint is a presentation software application developed and published by Microsoft.

hasPart.name: Microsoft Access
hasPart.description: Microsoft Access is a database management system developed and published by Microsoft.
hasPart.keywords: Microsoft Access, Database Management System, Relational Database
